title: Stage S28
description: Level 1 grammar practice focusing on stage-specific patterns and expressions.
examples: This method is much more effective.
He runs far faster than his brother.
learning_points: Level 1 target grammar and expressions with practical usage examples

sentences.kr: 이 방법이 훨씬 더 효과적이에요.
sentences.en: This method is much more effective.

sentences.kr: 그는 형/동생보다 훨씬 더 빨리 뛰어요.
sentences.en: He runs far faster than his brother.

sentences.kr: 그녀는 단연 우리 반에서 가장 우수한 학생이에요.
sentences.en: She is by far the best student in our class.

sentences.kr: 생각했던 것만큼 비싸지 않아요.
sentences.en: It's not nearly as expensive as I thought.

sentences.kr: 오늘 날씨가 어제보다 상당히 더 따뜻해요.
sentences.en: Today's weather is considerably warmer than yesterday.

sentences.kr: 이 차가 상당히 더 비싸요.
sentences.en: This car is significantly more expensive.

sentences.kr: 새 버전이 구버전보다 약간 더 나아요.
sentences.en: The new version is slightly better than the old one.

sentences.kr: 이 해결책이 비교할 수 없을 정도로 더 실용적이에요.
sentences.en: This solution is infinitely more practical.

sentences.kr: 그녀는 언니/여동생만큼 키가 클 리가 없어요.
sentences.en: She's nowhere near as tall as her sister.

sentences.kr: 이것이 단연 가장 어려운 일이에요.
sentences.en: This is hands down the most difficult task.

sentences.en: This method is much more effective.
